South Sudan NGO Forum
Facilitating coordination of NGOs to effectively operate in South Sudan
(The Job Vancancies board can be found here here.)

About

The NGO Forum is an independent coordinating body of approximately 160 national and 142 international NGOs that serves and facilitates the work of its members to address the humanitarian and development needs in South Sudan.
All member organisations agree to provide humanitarian and/or development assistance to the South Sudanese people regardless of ethnic background, political affiliation, or religious belief.

The South Sudan NGO Forum Secretariat exists primarily to serve the needs of its members and to act in their interest.
To this end, the NGO Forum pursues five aims:
1) Information Sharing
2) External Engagement
3) Policy
4) NNGO-INGO Coordination
5) Security

read more

Membership

All members must be non-governmental, non-political, non-proselytising, be a humanitarian and/or development assistance actorand have a full-time presence in South Sudan.
Prior registration with both the Ministry of Labour and Relief and Reconstruction Commission is also required.
Observer membership can be facilitated on request.

Registration is done on a yearly basis with new members completing all of the following steps.
1) Completion of the application form.
2) Approval by the Steering Commitee
3) Presentation at the Country Directors meeting followed by membership vote.
Membership fees for NNGOs is a fixed fee of 130SSP while INGOs are charges on a sliding scale based on their annual operating budget.

read more

What we do

Security

Collection analysis and sharing of NGO related security information.

Read more

Coordination

Facilitating engagement between NGOs and other humanitarian actors in South Sudan.

Read more

Policy

Developing policy briefings and prioritise areas for advocacy focus that are consistent to with the interests of the Forum members.

Read more

Resources

  • INGO Contacts[only available to member NGOs]: Email infomgr@southsudan.org for the link
  • NNGO Contacts[only available to member NGOs]: Email nngo-info@southsudan.org for the link
  • Operational Presence 3W: Go to 3w.southsudanngoforum.org
  • Multi-dataset map: Go to Operations Dashboard(work in progess)
  • Security Incidents Dashboard [only available to member NGOs]: Email infomgr@southsudan.org for the link
  • South Sudan Knowledge Network; A platform hosted by the NGO Forum which contains a large collection of South Sudan-focused research material: www.southsudanknowledgenetwork.org
  • South Sudan Knowledge Capacity Development Association; A portal aimed at connecting capacity development service providers to civil society organizations, government, and the private sector to engage and meet their capacity development needs through access to high-quality and affordable services.: Capacity Development Portal
  • Job and Announcements Message Board: A message board hosted by the NGO Forum where NGO can post their job vacancies; Job Vacancies

For documents & research papers written or collected by the NGO Forum vistit the Information Portal
